extends java.lang.Object

    Title: Rule Set

    Description: Structure to store a complete rule set

    Since:
    JDK1.4
    Version:
    1.1
    Author:
    Written by José Ramón Cano de Amo (University of Jaen) 07/31/2004, Modified by Alberto Fernández (University of Granada) 11/29/2004
